ask_name: Can I get your name, please?
meeting_ask_guest_name: With whom would you like to schedule the meeting?
meeting_ask_day: What day did you have in mind for the meeting?
meeting_ask_start_time: For what time should the meeting be scheduled?
meeting_ask_end_time: When do you expect the meeting to wrap up?
meeting_ask_reason: Would you like to note down an optional reason for the meeting?
meeting_inform_confirmed: Fantastic, your meeting with {guest_name:s} has been successfully scheduled for {day:s}, {start_time:d}-{end_time:d}.
meeting_inform_unavailable_ask_different:
Unfortunately {guest_name:s} is not able to make {day:s} @ {start_time:d}.
Would you like to try scheduling the meeting for a different day or time?
anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you with scheduling meetings.
